com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers

Class LtpaAuthenticationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation.DelegatingCompositeHandlerBase
      • com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.LtpaAuthenticationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientHandler, IHTTPConnectionHandler, ISOAPMessageHandler, Handler<SOAPMessageContext>, SOAPHandler<SOAPMessageContext>

    public final class LtpaAuthenticationHandler
extends com.i2group.apollo.client.handlers.implementation.DelegatingCompositeHandlerBase
    A handler that provides authentication functionality to the requests from a client to an Intelligence Analysis Platform web service. This implementation performs user name and password authentication when the connection is made, and uses a lightweight third-party authentication (LTPA) token to maintain authentication information over a client session.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LtpaAuthenticationHandler(String serviceUsername, String servicePassword)
      Constructs a new LtpaAuthenticationHandler that uses the specified user name and password to perform authentication with the Intelligence Analysis Platform web service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LtpaAuthenticationHandler

        public LtpaAuthenticationHandler(String serviceUsername,
                         String servicePassword)
        Constructs a new LtpaAuthenticationHandler that uses the specified user name and password to perform authentication with the Intelligence Analysis Platform web service.
        Parameters:
        serviceUsername - A String containing the user name.
        servicePassword - A String containing the password.
